adverbs.description: greenly (comparative more greenly, superlative most greenly)

examples: But within this swarded circle, into which the lime-walk brings us —Whence the beeches rounded greenly, stand away in reverent fear;I will let no music enter, saving what the fountain sings us  […]

entries.meaning: In a naive or immature manner.
examples: They  […]  proposed that we should join them in a plan to drench the president next morning with freezing water. We consented greenly enough.
